section.title: How To Contribute
section.para: Hey, thanks for wanting to help! Here are what we'd really appreciate:

listitem.para: Request features and report bugs - this is the most important thing!!!
Pick an active ticket, fix/resolve it, and attach the patch to the ticket. Don't forget to read the note below.

section.title: Repository URL
section.para: Our Subversion repository's URL is http://opensvn.csie.org/testoob/trunk.

section.title: A note on submitting patches
section.para: To prevent licensing woes in the future, we request that patches be released under the Apache License, Version 2.0. This will allow us to re-release TestOOB under a different license in the future, for example one that can be contributed to the Python Software Foundation, if TestOOB is ever considered for inclusion as a standard Python module.
